name: Personal Finance Tracker
description: The only Personal Finance Dashboard you will ever need to track your Personal Finances with ease!Do you feel overwhelmed while your finances that feels like a full-time job?This Spreadsheet template is all you need to manage all your finances in one place with a simple and easy to use interface as shown below.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for docu
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Monthly Budgeting Tracker; Income Tracker; Expense Tracker; Bills Payment Tracker; Subscription Expenses Tracker; Investment Tracker; Sinking Funds Tracker; Debt Payment Tracker
